content: When life takes the wind out of your sails, it is to test you at the oars.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal; you do not change your decision to get there.

author: Charlotte Whitton
content: When one must, one can.

author: Samuel Goldwyn
content: When someone does something good, applaud! You will make two people happy.

author: Maya Angelou
content: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.

author: Wilma Rudolph
content: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.

author: George Lopez
content: When things are bad, it's the best time to reinvent yourself.

author: Guy Lafleur
content: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.

author: Viktor E. Frankl
content: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.

author: Helen Keller
content: When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.

author: Bob Hope
content: When we recall the past, we usually find that it is the simplest things - not the great occasions - that in retrospect give off the greatest glow of happiness.

author: Mark Twain
content: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.

author: William Arthur Ward
content: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.

author: Richard Pryor
content: When you ain't got no money, you gotta get an attitude.

author: Paulo Coelho
content: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.

author: Paulo Coelho
content: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.

author: Meister Eckhart
content: When you are thwarted, it is your own attitude that is out of order.

author: Robert Bresson
content: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.

author: Natalie Gulbis
content: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.

author: Carol Burnett
content: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
content: When you pray for anyone you tend to modify your personal attitude toward him.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
content: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.

author: Dian Fossey
content: When you realize the value of all life, you dwell less on what is past and concentrate more on the preservation of the future.

author: Matt Kemp
content: When you think positive, good things happen.

author: William Cowper
content: Where men of judgment creep and feel their way, The positive pronounce without dismay.

author: Jim Elliot
content: Wherever you are - be all there.

author: Art Buchwald
content: Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
content: While there's life, there's hope.

author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
content: While we are postponing, life speeds by.

author: Ugo Betti
content: Who cares about great marks left behind? We have one life... just one. Our life. We have nothing else.

author: Sophocles
content: Who seeks shall find.

author: Anne Frank
content: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

author: Virgil van Dijk
content: Why be negative when you can enjoy life and be positive? That's something I learned over the years.

author: Joel Osteen
content: Why don't you start believing that no matter what you have or haven't done, that your best days are still out in front of you.

author: Dr. Seuss
content: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?

author: Clara Schumann
content: Why hurry over beautiful things? Why not linger and enjoy them?

author: Robert Kiyosaki
content: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.

author: Brian Tracy
content: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event.

author: Brian Tracy
content: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event.

author: Confucius
content: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.

author: Doris Roberts
content: With my talent, I can make people laugh and give them another attitude about life. What a blessing that is for me.

author: Amelia Barr
content: With renunciation life begins.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
content: With self-discipline most anything is possible.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now.

author: Andre Maurois
content: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.

author: Johannes Brahms
content: Without craftsmanship, inspiration is a mere reed shaken in the wind.

author: Gordon B. Hinckley
content: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.

author: Lou Holtz
content: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.

author: Grace Kelly
content: Women's natural role is to be a pillar of the family.

author: Abraham Joshua Heschel
content: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Work hard at your job and you can make a living. Work hard on yourself and you can make a fortune.

author: George Allen, Sr.
content: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.

author: George Allen, Sr.
content: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.

author: Leo Buscaglia
content: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, it only saps today of its joy.

author: Jimmy Buffett
content: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.

author: Theodor W. Adorno
content: Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.

author: Lyndon B. Johnson
content: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.

author: Lyndon B. Johnson
content: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.

author: Khalil Gibran
content: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.

author: Richard Bach
content: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.

author: Richard Bach
content: You are never given a wish without also being given the power to make it come true. You may have to work for it, however.

author: Les Brown
content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Joyce Meyer
content: You are not hopeless. You are not helpless. Because there is a God who is alive and loves you!

author: Ted Turner
content: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.

author: Oliver Goldsmith
content: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.

author: Henry Ford
content: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
content: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

author: Flip Wilson
content: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.

author: Deepak Chopra
content: You can't make positive choices for the rest of your life without an environment that makes those choices easy, natural, and enjoyable.

author: Jack London
content: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.

author: Russell Simmons
content: You cannot find it anywhere, because it is located inside you... happiness is your natural state.

author: Joyce Meyer
content: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.

author: Joyce Meyer
content: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You cannot tailor-make the situations in life but you can tailor-make the attitudes to fit those situations.

author: Max Lucado
content: You change your life by changing your heart.

author: Shakti Gawain
content: You create your opportunities by asking for them.

author: Desmond Tutu

author: John Cleese

author: Sandra Bullock
content: You don't have to give birth to someone to have a family.

author: Alan Watts
content: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.

author: Harvey S. Firestone

author: Winston Churchill

author: Vernon Howard
content: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.

author: Suzanne Vega
content: You have to defend your honor. And your family.

author: Unknown
content: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.

author: Denis Diderot
content: You have to make it happen.

author: Edwin van der Sar
content: You hope to bring your 'A Game' to any game, and of course you do in a final. You hope to bring experience, fitness, communication skills, motivational skills.

author: Babe Ruth
content: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.

author: Richard Bandler
content: You know what ? Certain people think they will feel good if certain things happen The trick is : you have to feel good for no reason

author: Don Rickles
content: You know what's funny to me? Attitude.

author: Norman Schwarzkopf
content: You learn far more from negative leadership than from positive leadership. Because you learn how not to do it. And, therefore, you learn how to do it.

author: Anita Baker

author: Alejandro Jodorowsky
content: You live in the image you have of the world. Every one of us lives in a different world, with different space and different time.

author: Maxwell Maltz
content: You make mistakes. Mistakes don't make you.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

author: Emmet Fox

author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

author: George S. Patton
content: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.

author: R. Buckminster Fuller
content: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.

author: Cicely Tyson
content: You never know what motivates you.

author: George Lucas
content: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.

author: Angelique Kerber
content: You will always have ups and downs in your life and your career, but just stay positive and go for it.

author: Albert Camus

author: Joel Osteen
content: You will never change what you tolerate.

author: Helen Rowland
content: You will never win if you never begin.

author: Charles de Gaulle
content: You'll live. Only the best get killed.

author: Joel Osteen
content: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.

author: Walter Hagen
content: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.

author: Brian Tracy
content: Your ability to discipline yourself to set clear goals, and then to work toward them every day, will do more to guarantee your success than any other single factor.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.

author: Anita DeFrantz
content: Your goal should be out of reach but not out of sight.

author: Morihei Ueshiba
content: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.

author: Norman Cousins
content: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

author: Desmond Tutu
content: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.

author: Khalil Gibran
content: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.

author: Shiv Khera
content: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.

author: Nido Qubein
content: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.

author: Les Brown
content: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.

author: Leo Buscaglia
content: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.

author: Thomas Gray
content: Youth smiles without any reason. It is one of its chiefest charms.
